parameters.query:
SELECT extract(epoch from max(created_at)) * 1000 AS last_ts
FROM public.event_log
WHERE lead_id = (SELECT id FROM public.leads WHERE chat_id = $1 AND canal='telegram')

INSERT INTO public.leads (chat_id, canal, username, nombre, estado)
VALUES ($1, 'telegram', $2, $3, 'activo')
ON CONFLICT (canal, chat_id)
DO UPDATE SET
  username   = EXCLUDED.username,
  nombre     = EXCLUDED.nombre,
  updated_at = now()
RETURNING id;

INSERT INTO public.event_log (lead_id, evento, payload)
VALUES ($1::uuid, $2::text, NULL);

parameters.query:
SELECT property_id, titulo, ciudad, precio_actual, status_txt, fecha_fin
FROM public.properties_view
WHERE status_txt = 'activa'
ORDER BY fecha_fin ASC NULLS LAST, updated_at DESC
LIMIT 5;

WITH sel AS (
  SELECT replace($1::text, 'menu_detalle_', '') AS pid
)
SELECT pv.property_id, pv.titulo, pv.ciudad, pv.direccion,
       pv.precio_actual, pv.status_txt, pv.fecha_fin,
       pv.media_url, pv.google_maps_link,
       COALESCE(
         jsonb_object_agg(pa.clave, pa.valor)
         FILTER (WHERE pa.clave IS NOT NULL), '{}'::jsonb
       ) AS attrs
FROM public.properties_view pv
LEFT JOIN public.property_attrs pa ON pa.property_id = pv.property_id
WHERE pv.property_id::text = (SELECT pid FROM sel)
GROUP BY pv.property_id, pv.titulo, pv.ciudad, pv.direccion,
         pv.precio_actual, pv.status_txt, pv.fecha_fin,
         pv.media_url, pv.google_maps_link;

WITH tipos AS (
  SELECT * FROM (VALUES
    (1,'Apartamento'),
    (2,'Casa'),
    (3,'Oficina'),
    (4,'Local'),
    (5,'Bodega'),
    (6,'Lote')
  ) AS t(id,label)
)
SELECT 
  t.id::text AS tipo,
  t.label,
  COUNT(a.id) AS cnt
FROM tipos t
LEFT JOIN public.assets a
  ON a.asset_type = t.id AND a.deleted = 0
GROUP BY t.id, t.label
ORDER BY t.id;

parameters.text: Perfecto. Escribe la ciudad donde te interesa buscar (ej.: "Medell√≠n", "Bogot√°", "Cali").

parameters.query:
WITH lead AS (
  SELECT $2::uuid AS lead_id
),
at AS (
  -- √öltimo asset_type guardado para ese lead (evento await_city)
  SELECT (e.payload ->> 'asset_type')::int AS asset_type
  FROM public.event_log e
  JOIN lead l ON l.lead_id = e.lead_id
  WHERE e.evento = 'await_city'
  ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
matches AS (
  SELECT c.id::bigint AS city_id,
         c.title
  FROM public.mia_city c
  WHERE unaccent(lower(c.title)) LIKE '%' || unaccent(lower($1)) || '%'
),
hits AS (
  SELECT 
    m.city_id::text,
    m.title,
    (
      SELECT COUNT(*)::int
      FROM public.assets a
      WHERE a.deleted = 0
        AND a.city_id = m.city_id
        AND ( (SELECT asset_type FROM at) IS NULL
              OR a.asset_type = (SELECT asset_type FROM at) )
    ) AS assets_cnt
  FROM matches m
)
SELECT 
  COUNT(*)::int               AS n,
  MIN(h.city_id)::text        AS first_id,
  MIN(h.title)                AS first_title,
  MIN(h.assets_cnt)           AS first_assets_cnt,
  (SELECT asset_type FROM at) AS asset_type,
  json_agg(h)                 AS cities
FROM hits h;

parameters.query:
WITH lead AS (
  SELECT id AS lead_id FROM public.leads WHERE chat_id = $1 AND canal='telegram'
),
city_ctx AS (
  SELECT (payload->>'city_id')::bigint AS city_id
  FROM public.event_log e
  JOIN lead l ON l.lead_id = e.lead_id
  WHERE e.evento IN ('await_city','selected_city')
  ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
),
type_ctx AS (
  SELECT (payload->>'asset_type')::int AS asset_type
  FROM public.event_log e
  JOIN lead l ON l.lead_id = e.lead_id
  WHERE e.evento = 'await_city'
  ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT property_id, titulo, ciudad, precio_actual, status_txt, fecha_fin
FROM public.properties_view
WHERE status_txt = 'activa'
  AND ($2::bigint IS NULL OR precio_actual >= $2)
  AND ($3::bigint IS NULL OR precio_actual <= $3)
  AND ((SELECT city_id FROM city_ctx) IS NULL OR city_id = (SELECT city_id FROM city_ctx))
  AND ((SELECT asset_type FROM type_ctx) IS NULL OR asset_type = (SELECT asset_type FROM type_ctx))
ORDER BY fecha_fin ASC NULLS LAST, updated_at DESC
LIMIT 5;

parameters.jsCode:
const m = ($node["Normalize"].json.text || "").match(/^menu_seguir_(\d+)$/);
return [{ json: { asset_id: m ? parseInt(m[1],10) : null } }];

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO public.asset_follow (chat_id, asset_id, created_at, active)
VALUES ($1, $2, NOW(), TRUE)
ON CONFLICT (chat_id, asset_id)
DO UPDATE SET active = TRUE, created_at = EXCLUDED.created_at;

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO public.event_log (lead_id, evento, payload, created_at)
VALUES (
  (SELECT id FROM public.leads WHERE chat_id=$1 AND canal='telegram'),
  'selected_budget',
  jsonb_build_object('precio_min',$2,'precio_max',$3),
  NOW()
);

SELECT (payload->>'precio_min')::bigint AS precio_min,
       (payload->>'precio_max')::bigint AS precio_max
FROM public.event_log
WHERE lead_id = (SELECT id FROM public.leads WHERE chat_id=$1 AND canal='telegram')
  AND evento = 'selected_budget'
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

VALUES (

INSERT INTO public.event_log (lead_id, evento, payload, created_at)
VALUES (
  (SELECT id FROM public.leads WHERE chat_id=$1 AND canal='telegram'),
  'selected_rooms',
  jsonb_build_object('rooms',$2),
  NOW()
);

SELECT 1
FROM public.event_log
WHERE lead_id = (SELECT id FROM public.leads WHERE chat_id=$1 AND canal='telegram')
  AND (evento = 'await_budget' OR evento = 'await_rooms')
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;
